Question: In 1956, this person recruited a young all-female singing group named the Cookies, and reshaped them as The Raelettes.
Hints: This person possessed one of the most recognizable voices in American music.
Two years later in 1963 this person and Sandra Jean Betts welcomed daughter, Sheila Raye **** Robinson.
The song served as this person' first work with Feller, who arranged and conducted the recording.
